snippet: The Americans’ disappearance raised fears that Westerners were again becoming targets for militias and criminal gangs that kidnap foreigners for money or political reasons.
abstract: American Embassy and Iraqi authorities are searching for three American citizens who have gone missing Baghdad, igniting fears that  militias and criminal gangs have resumed targeting Westerners for money or political reasons.
lead_paragraph: The Americans’ disappearance raised fears that Westerners were again becoming targets for militias and criminal gangs that kidnap foreigners for money or political reasons.

headline.main: 3 Americans Are Missing in Baghdad, Embassy Says
headline.print_headline: 3 Americans Are Missing in Baghdad, Embassy Says
